description: Amendments to planning permission dated 31 July 2018 (RN: 18/01096) for the variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 12 May 2016 (RN: 16/02105/FULL) for the use of part basement, part ground, first, second, third, fourth and fifth floors for residential use (Class C3) to create nine residential units (2 x 1 bed, 4 x 2 bed and 3 x 3 bed units). Erection of a two storey rear extension at first and second floor levels with terraces above; installation of rear lightwells; removal of external staircase; installation of skylights and introduction of new and replacement plant; Namely, alterations to the detailed design of the approved scheme including enlarged and new lightwell at ground floor level and changes to the internal residential layout; rendering and alterations to windows to the inside of the lightwell area; installation of two ventilation ducts; reconfiguration of approved rooflights and new automatic opening smoke vent (AOV) and acoustic enclosure to approved air conditioning units and two additional air conditioning units and AOV to the main roof; Namely, to allow the retention of existing railings at front fourth floor level.
decision_conditions: +1 Design ext appearance OK in CA
